thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian dumps Scott Disick | The Advertiser
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian dumps Scott Disick | The Advertiser

author: Bryan Hood and Derrick Bryson Taylor
title: Kourtney Kardashian dumps Scott Disick | The Advertiser
text:
KOURTNEY Kardashian and Scott Disick’s rocky romance has come to an end.
The reality TV stars, parents of three young children, broke up over the holiday weekend — a decision she made after Disick’s years of partying and broken promises, according to E! News , the news branch of the network that airs Keeping Up With the Kardashians .
“Kourtney has always taken Scott back and been by his side, but now with three kids it has gotten old,” a source told the website. “Kourtney has to do what’s best for the kids.”
Single ... Kourtney stepped out alone at the weekend after the reported break-up. Source: Supplied
‘It’s getting old’ ... A source says Kourtney is sick of Scott’s alleged philandering. Source: Supplied
Rumours of discord have surrounded the couple for much of 2015, the New York Post reports . In March, Disick checked himself into a Costa Rican rehab facility, only to leave a week later.
Speculation has only picked up since then, with the 32-year-old being snapped getting cozy with a woman who was not his longtime partner days ago, while Kardashian, 36, was at home in California with the kids. Reports identified the woman as ex-girlfriend Chloe Bartoli.
Best for the kids ... TV stars Kourtney Kardashian and Scott Disick give son Mason some two-on-one time. Picture: Splash News Source: Supplied
“Scott has been running around saying he’s single,” a source is Quote: d as saying. “Kourtney dumped him after she saw the pics [in Monte Carlo] and he hasn’t been home after a month-long party binge.”
Kourtney's eventful Fourth of July (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4u4iR9E1lN/embed .)
The former couple, who had been together for roughly nine years, welcomed their third child together, son Reign Aston Disick, in December. They also share son Mason, 5, and daughter Penelope, who turns 3 on Wednesday.
Disick has been noticeably absent from family outings including Easter Sunday services as well as a family trip to Disneyland to celebrate Kim Kardashian and Kanye West’s daughter North’s second birthday.
Disneyland without Dad (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4SRpQok1o_/embed .)
Perhaps last summer’s stay in the Hamptons was a precursor of things to come for the couple. Reality cameras captured Kourtney kicking Disick out of the house because of his partying ways.
A rep for Kourtney did not immediately return a request for comment.
Partying ways ... Scott Disick celebrates his birthday with Kourtney Kardashian in Las Vegas in late May. Picture: Splash News Source: Supplied
Originally published as Kourtney Kardashian dumps Scott Disick
